title: Textile, ca. 1950
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: plain weave, printed
dimensions: Warp x Weft (weft selvedge to selvedge): 277 x 133.5 cm (9 ft. 1 1/16 in. x 52 9/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: A repeating pattern of the letters 'IBM' in three different graphic presentations: narrowly outlined in black, heavily outlined in black, and solid blue.
